service.title: Additional Media Type Structured Syntax Suffixes
service.documentation: A content media type name sometimes includes partitioned meta-information distinguished by a structured syntax to permit noting an attribute of the media as a suffix to the name. This document defines several structured syntax suffixes for use with media type registrations. In particular, it defines and registers the "+json", "+ber", "+der", "+fastinfoset", "+wbxml" and "+zip" structured syntax suffixes, and provides a media type structured syntax suffix registration form for the "+xml" structured syntax suffix.

structured-syntax-suffix.documentation: The suffix "+json" MAY be used with any media type whose representation follows that established for "application/json".
The suffix "+ber" MAY be used with any media type whose representation follows the BER transfer syntax.
The suffix "+der" MAY be used with any media type whose representation follows the DER transfer syntax.
The suffix "+fastinfoset" MAY be used with any media type whose representation follows that established for "application/fastinfoset".
The suffix "+wbxml" MAY be used with any media type whose representation follows that established for "application/vnd.wap.wbxml".
The suffix "+zip" MAY be used with any media type whose representation follows that established for "application/zip".
